member.name: P:Orleans.Configuration.RedisGrainDirectoryOptions.EntryExpiry
member.summary: Entry expiry, null by default. A value should be set ONLY for ephemeral environments (like in tests). Setting a value different from null will cause duplicate activations in the cluster.
